descriptionHTML:
Get the greatest watchfaces for your Android Wear watch. Watch Faces For Android Wear is a collection of the best designs you will find for your watch. Activate watchfaces with a simple touch on your smartphone. New watchfaces are provided continuously. Please note: You have to choose "Watchface Designs" as your watchface on watch.


Discover more about Android Wear with "Android Wear Center": http://tinyurl.com/m87stxs


Features:
★ Big collection of free watchfaces
★ Analog and digital watchfaces
★ Free watchfaces
★ More than 40 Watchfaces by designers
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Biggest collection of awesome designs
★ Simple one touch activation
★ New watchfaces are added continously


You have to own an Android Wear device to use this app
Currently compatible devices:
► HUAWEI Watch
► Moto 360 Gen 2 (2015)
► Moto 360 Gen 1 (2014)
► Asus Zenwatch
► LG G Watch
► LG G Watch R
► LG G Watch Urbane (Android Wear version)
► Samsung Gear Live
► Sony SmartWatch 3


Please note:
-Make sure your mobile is compatible with Android Wear.
-Make sure to pair your phone with the wearable device with help of the Android Wear App.
-You have to choose Watchface Designs as your Watchface on watch. After that choose watchface from phone app


Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.
comments: even after updating... Cannot get the free ones to load to my watch. Not going spend money and STILL not get one to load!
Rip off Charged twice for same watch face, still won't download to watch because when I try and send it, the app tries to charge me AGAIN....seriously????

Watch faces won't load When I click free watchfaces it says "apply (insert name here)" and nothing happens. When I click the dots it says "synchronizing with the smartwatch" and nothing happens. Anyone know a fix?
A good tool Initially i was facing some problems, but now it works flawless with some really nice faces that covers compatibility and suitability ....
Ordered a watch face and got the wrong one installed Ordered a watch face, but another got installed.  Wanted to refund, but that wasn't possible ðŸ˜• so be aware... No refund possible...
